title: Sore Ike! Anpanman: Baikinman no Gyakushuu
synopsis: Baikinsennin tells Baikinman about a magical vase called "Mekoisu no tsubo" that could grant him the power to destroy Anpanman. A princess of the perished Yaada-koku, Yaada-hime, also seeks the vase to restore her kingdom to its glory. When Anpanman joins forces with her, a furious chase ensues with both sides trying to get their hands on the vase.
voices: ['Toda, Keiko', 'Nakao, Ryusei', 'Yanagisawa, Michiyo', 'Yamadera, Kouichi', 'Tsuru, Hiromi', 'Masuoka, Hiroshi', 'Shimamoto, Sumi', 'Sakuma, Rei', 'Mitsuya, Yuuji', 'Mitsuya, Yuuji']
staff: [['Nagaoka, Akinori', ['Director']], ['Yanase, Takashi', ['Theme Song Lyrics', ' Original Creator']], ['Ootani, Kazuo', ['Theme Song Arrangement']], ['Dreaming', ['Theme Song Performance']]]
